metadata.author: Woona
metadata.desc:
Slug Interceptor (the tiny one) had isolated rooms before and became a meme for having the worst possible ship layout, allowing easy crew kills.
Now it uses the pirate layout. Creating a completely new layout for non-pirate ship messes up with the brains of veteran players.
Also, more than 2 weapons do not fit on the hull. Dunno if the limitation I put here works.
metadata.changelog: Slug Interceptor no longer has disconnected rooms.
